original_title: Revenge of the Pussy Suckers from Mars
overview: They are taking out the planet. They have to find the perfect man to clone in order to take over the world. The mars women Shelby Stevens and Misty Rain have the lesbian encounter on their outer space ship in the first scene. Directed by Anthony Spinelli and released in 1994, these “Pussy Suckers From Mars”, are long and luscious, sexual healers from another galaxy.
tagline: Horny female Martians land on earth looking for the "perfect' man to clone so they can take over the world.
title: Revenge of the Pussy Suckers from Mars
